Retrieve Results of an Advanced Search/Query

Source: R/retrieve_search_results.R
retrieve_search_results.Rd

Retrieve Results of an Advanced Search/Query

retrieve_search_results(queryURL)

Arguments

queryURL

URL of a query prepared on BacDive.DSMZ.de/AdvSearch, as explained in the vignette "Pre-Configuring Advanced Searches and Retrieving the Results".

Value

A list of lists containing either a single BacDive dataset in case the searchTerm was unambiguous (bacdive_id, sequence, culturecollectionno), or a large list containing all datasets that match an ambiguous searchTerm (most taxons).

Examples

plant_human_pathogens <- retrieve_search_results(queryURL = "https://bacdive.dsmz.de/advsearch?advsearch=search&site=advsearch&searchparams%5B5%5D%5Bsearchterm%5D=1&searchparams%5B156%5D%5Bsearchterm%5D=&searchparams%5B158%5D%5Bsearchterm%5D=1")
